title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: He supports the Green New Deal and has said that it "offers a once-in-a-generation opportunity." Padilla received a 100% score from the League of Conservation Voters in 2021. In April 2025, Padilla introduced the Fix Our Forests Act alongside Senators John Hickenlooper, John Curtis, and Tim Sheehy.

title: Alex Padilla | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
snippet: BILL 30. S.2994 — 119th Congress (2025-2026) Voter Purge Protection Act Sponsor: Padilla, Alex [Sen.-D-CA] (Introduced 10/09/2025) Cosponsors: (24) Committees: Senate - Rules and Administration Latest Action: Senate - 10/09/2025 Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

title: Alex Padilla - Ballotpedia
snippet: Alex Padilla (Democratic Party) is a member of the U.S. Senate from California. He assumed office on January 20, 2021. His current term ends on January 3, 2029.

title: U.S. Senator Alex Padilla ’94 discusses changing careers and federal policy with The Tech | The Tech
snippet: In an interview with The Tech, the Senator from California shared advice and discussed his switch from engineering to politics, President Trump’s higher education and immigration policy, and visions for the future.

title: Alex Padilla, a favorite to succeed Gavin Newsom, won’t run for California governor
snippet: U.S. Sen. Alex Padilla of California will not run for governor in next year’s highly watched race to succeed Gov. Gavin Newsom, the senator unexpectedly announced in the U.S.
